  index: "kibana_sample_data_ecommerce2",
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.indices.close({
  index: "kibana_sample_data_ecommerce2",
});
console.log(response1);

const response2 = await client.ccr.unfollow({
  index: "kibana_sample_data_ecommerce2",
});
console.log(response2);

  index: "kibana_sample_data_ecommerce2",
});
